article_node.title: Freedom Caucus Threatens to Tank Vote
article_node.summary: House Republicans are working to finalize a tax and spending bill, facing opposition from the Freedom Caucus over provisions like the SALT deduction and green energy tax credits. The bill's passage is uncertain, with concerns about its impact on the deficit and potential cuts to Medicaid and Medicare. Lawmakers are engaged in negotiations, with President Trump involved in discussions to unify support, while Democrats express strong opposition to the proposed cuts and the overall financial implications of the legislation.
